name: Nour Azouz
title: Software Engineer / Tech Lead / CTO
intro: Dedicated Software Engineer with 4+ years experience in full-stack development, desktop apps, and DevOps. Passionate about mentoring and impactful projects.
about: With 4+ years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in creating scalable web applications, desktop software, and robust DevOps pipelines. I've led teams as a Tech Lead and CTO, managing development workflows and mentoring junior developers.
